imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Crop to a clean square headshot with neutral background (UMB PHOTO.jpg > umb-photo.dim_400x400.jpg)

existing_features.title: Add the uploaded photo (UMB PHOTO.jpg) as a partner profile image in the Partners section. Store the image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/umb-photo.jpg and display it in the Partners component as the profile picture for the corresponding partner entry.

projectName: Add uploaded partner photo to Partners section
